source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @Parallel INT = 3

DECLARE @i INT = 0

-- Safety measure, no more than 5 parallel channels
IF @Parallel > 5
	BEGIN
		SET @Parallel = 5
	END

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #Selection
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #EndResults

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY S.name, T.name, T.create_date) AS Row, S.name AS SchemaName, T.name AS TableName, T.create_date AS CreationDate
INTO #Selection
FROM sys.tables AS T 
    INNER JOIN sys.schemas AS S
    ON S.schema_id = T.schema_id
WHERE s.name = 'Dimension'


DECLARE @SQLSubQuery NVARCHAR(100), @SQLQuery NVARCHAR(1000)
CREATE TABLE #EndResults (Batch INT, Row INT, SchemaName NVARCHAR(50), TableName NVARCHAR(50), CreationDate DATETIME)


WHILE @i < @Parallel
	BEGIN
		IF @i = 0
			BEGIN
				SET @SQLQuery = (SELECT CONCAT('INSERT INTO #EndResults SELECT ', @i,' AS Batch, * FROM #Selection WHERE (Row%',@Parallel,')=', @i))
				SET @i = @i + 1
			END
		ELSE
			BEGIN
				SET @SQLSubQuery = (SELECT CONCAT('SELECT ', @i,' AS Batch, * FROM #Selection WHERE (Row%',@Parallel,')=', @i))
				SET @SQLQuery = (SELECT CONCAT(@SQLQuery,' UNION ALL ', @SQLSubQuery))

				SET @i = @i + 1
		END
	END

EXEC sp_executesql @SQLQuery

SELECT	Batch,
		ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY Batch ORDER BY SchemaName, TableName, CreationDate) AS Row,
		SchemaName,
		TableName,
		CreationDate
FROM #EndResults
WHERE Batch = 0
